basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The Dr. Larry Foster Memorial Scholarship is available for students to apply for who meet the following eligibility requirements: Eligibility Requirements Declared Legal Studies or Accounting major Earned a minimum of 45 credit hours at the time of application Not eligible to graduate prior to Fall 2024 Have a minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled full-time Demonstrate financial need

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2 is Finance-Business Law   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Finance-Business Law   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Finance-Business Law   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Finance-Business Law
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2 is Finance-Business Law   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Finance-Business Law   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Finance-Business Law   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Finance-Business Law

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
